name: Artillery
description:
Game made inspired by Antonio's request in Games On Demand Game Jam.

Controls : WASD or arrows to move , mouse left button to shoot and space to perform the character special attack ( 3 mana required).

Thank you for playing and Have Fun !

Art : https://mauriciomartino.itch.io/ and https://filiperaizer.itch.io/.

Coding  : https://andregferro.itch.io/
